# Preliminary reports

```{r list_reports, include=FALSE}
reports <- list.dirs(here::here("docs/bookdown"),
                     recursive = FALSE) %>%
  stringr::str_split_fixed(pattern = "/", n = 8)
reports <- reports[ , 8]
```

These reports are a preliminary analysis of ecological and socioeconomic data sourced from `assessmentdata`, `survdat`, and other public data sources.

```{r}
purrr::map(reports, 
           ~paste("<a href='https://rtabandera.github.io/esp_data_aggregation/bookdown/", 
                  .x, "/index'>", .x, "</a>", sep = "")) %>%
  unlist() %>%
  knitr::kable(col.names = "Species name")

```
